template <typename PreferredT, typename ActualT>
struct vsip::impl::Adjust_pack_type
File: ../../../vsip/core/adjust_layout.hpp

Variant of Adjust_type for adjusting pack_type's.

In particular, adjusts Stride_unknown pack types to something that can be used to allocate a block.

Specializations:
Adjust_pack_type<Any_type,Stride_unknown>
